column4: Could someone be extremely helpful and tell me step by step what I need to do in order to add 1024x768 to my possible screen resolutions?
No one here knows how to add screen resolutions that aren't listed?
usually by adding them to xorg.conf
I'm an ubuntu noob. Can you tell me what to type?
if you do it wrong then X may not start
first of all, open /etc/X11/xorg.conf in a text editor, scroll to the bottom and you should see a list of default resolutions
tell me when you understand what you're looking at
I'm in xorg.conf right now. I'm just trying to add 1024x768 as a possible resolution
you should see the existing format, just write in the new value so that it looks the same
but, to save this file you'll need to edit it using sudo
I looked around and didn't see anything.
Dacvak towards the bottom, you should see a list of resolutions
There are no resolutions for some reason.
can you copy and paste it to http://rafb.net/paste
do you have a Section "Screen" in the file?
if yours doesn't resemble mine, I think I'll stop trying to help, kind of dizzy, need to take a break
